_header: When the philosophers Pythagoras and Tubal
_description: Leconfield proverbs: Poem on music — stanzas of four or six lines

BLRoy18Dii.First Lines: When the philosophers putagoras and tuball.From the poure sympill hammer & stethe sbstanciall.…
BLRoy18Dii.Last Lines: If we moder oure musyke as the trewe tune is.In heuyn we shall synge Osanna in excelsis.
BLRoy18Dii.Attributed Title: The prouerbis in the garet at the New lodge in the parke of lekingfelde (f. 198, in rubric)
